channel.title: golang on Jose Valecillos
channel.description: Recent content in golang on Jose Valecillos

item.title: Testing Serialization errors in Golang
item.description: How do you cover negative scenarios for JSON/XML serialization in Golang using the standard library?. There is a trick that can be used whenever you are using a float64 type in your struct.

item.title: Creating a free personal site on GitHub Pages
item.description: This tutorial will show how to create your own blog, personal site, portfolio or landing page in GitHub Pages using Hugo and how to automate the process with Travis CI.
